name: Silicon Valley Bank
description: Silicon Valley Bank (SVB) is a high-tech commercial bank that focuses on providing financial services to technology, life science, and venture capital firms. Founded in 1983 and headquartered in Santa Clara, California, SVB has developed a reputation as a key player in the innovation economy, offering a range of financial solutions tailored to the unique needs of startups and growth companies. The bank provides loans, treasury and cash management services, and investment banking, supporting companies at all stages of development. With a robust understanding of the technology landscape, SVB partners with entrepreneurs and investors to help them achieve their goals. In addition to banking services, SVB offers access to a network of industry connections and insights, fostering collaboration within the innovation ecosystem. Committed to driving growth in the sectors it serves, Silicon Valley Bank also leverages its deep expertise to support sustainability initiatives and emerging technologies. As a trusted financial partner, SVB plays a critical role in the success of many of the world’s most innovative companies.
ceo: Greg W. W. W. W. W. W. W.

key_executives.name: Greg W. W. W. W. W. W. W.

seo.meta_title: Silicon Valley Bank | Financial Services for Innovators
seo.meta_description: Explore Silicon Valley Bank, the financial partner for innovators and entrepreneurs. Discover our banking services tailored for technology and life sciences.

faq.question: What does Silicon Valley Bank specialize in?
faq.answer: Silicon Valley Bank specializes in providing financial services to technology, life science, and venture capital firms.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Silicon Valley Bank?
faq.answer: The CEO of Silicon Valley Bank is Greg W. W. W. W. W. W. W.

faq.question: Where is Silicon Valley Bank headquartered?
faq.answer: Silicon Valley Bank is headquartered in Santa Clara, California, USA.

faq.question: What services does Silicon Valley Bank offer?
faq.answer: SVB offers commercial banking, investment banking, treasury and cash management services, as well as venture debt and equity financing.

faq.question: When was Silicon Valley Bank founded?
faq.answer: Silicon Valley Bank was founded in 1983.
